The best thing we have ever done at work ever is start the #santadogchallenge hashtag
@Jess_McAllen hey Jess, my spare room is free over the weekend if you want a short term solution, and you're welcome to store stuff here
@pwmxx my reviews here - https://t.co/RBG84FRcta and then 2013 but that was a bad year (it's betterer now) https://t.co/NahjRmkv4A and
@pwmxx it is ABSOLUTELY worth going to, holy fuck it's my favourite time of the year
@yakmoose undoubtably. I'll let you know if I hear someone crying soon
@yakmoose what about https://t.co/qkrrNxVtoZ
Got the idea for our 404 page from this year's @webstock but hopefully you'll never find it without this link https://t.co/pmYk1UoV8a
Only know a couple of the names of @webstock speakers but I know they'll all have relevant things to say to me. YAAAAAAAAY
They were delicious
That's two votes. I'm eating Dan's truffles
All in favour of me eating Dan's #nzosa2016 truffles? https://t.co/CXYeSDXKZo
@EdNZ I'm at Ubuntu, top left (yeah I'm front row)
@EdNZ are you here? What table? Hi!
Boy that cloud looks like a sheep if you squint https://t.co/3FSlMV3mTv
Communications life goal: be like this most excellent spokeswoman from Lifewise https://t.co/eBzmNNbZui https://t.co/SsToeBGWGG
Are there any Storify-ish ways of collating tweets but privately (without having to pay for enterprise version of Storify)?
Big companies delivering (ha!) content we want via social media https://t.co/ZHY8YzVzQm
@NZPSA just to check, all your staff are on the Living Wage right?
Thanks so much to @InternetNZ for hosting #NetHarassment, especially for the strong moderation and the great conversations (& snacks)
Bloody love Ruth @womensrefugenz reminding all #NetHarrassment attendees they're poor, let's all make a donation okay?
@Feryllio @InternetNZ yes, check their website
For any safe space we need enforcement, engineering and education - @netsafeNZ #NetHarassment
"You have a responsibility when you have a platform, you have a duty of care" @DearMama_ #NetHarassment
FUCK @DearMama_ IS AMAZING. she's calmly replying to guy who wants us to sit down dude saying they want to rape us to death #netHarassment
The @womensrefugenz initiative putting safe sites onto sites like The Warehouse is such a good thing #NetHarassment
We get a good laugh from @netsafeNZ saying that officially, social media providers DO care about online harassment #NetHarassment
"I don't know any woman who hasn't had that kind of [gross negative] interaction" - yuuuup @DearMama_ slaying it with truths #NetHarassment
"It's not just 'trolls', it's all this vague behaviour men don't see as threatening" YUUUUUP #NetHarassment
"I think the problem is really white male fragility. We need to address the underlying power structures" -@conflictmedia 👍🏻👍🏽 #NetHarassment
"Well how about that [troll] just stop being an asshole?" - fuck yeah #NetHarassment
"The dominant message for women is 'if you want this to stop, then you need to stop existing online" - @DearMama_. YUUUUUUUUP #NetHarassment
Really really pleased @DearMama_ used Lesley Jones example - all she did was be in a movie, then look what happened #NetHarassment
Difference between speakers is astounding. Men speak in abstract theoretical, women have real lived experience #NetHarassment
"I find fact I write predominantly for women really infuriates lots of men. I get consistent & sustained crap" @DearMama_ #netharassment
At @internetNZ for a #netharassment talk. Have I eaten a domain's cost worth of canapés? Hopefully!
@SwarmApp when are you going to get a dumpling icon so I can share my one true love with everyone?
@irihapeta I of course have no idea what lemon party you are referring to https://t.co/KBTFvzEaQQ
This is the funniest tweet I have ever made FYI https://t.co/DtdRJ38i3U
@DrSMMorgan I'll tell you on Monday
I also commissioned someone to do me an alpaca sketch so I think I'm winning at work
Today I am tweeting videos featuring cute cartoon birds puking https://t.co/9nC8BJhAh1
I get to use HOT QUEER WINK GIFS FOR WORK. Life is perfect
Tweets I never thought I'd have to write: We are not at war with your garden
So what tool is the most important to you in your social media career Joanna? Oh you know, https://t.co/RbcNyvhkvV. Without a doubt.
Work meetings remain as on track as you might imagine when someone starts talking about "hot boning"
Sometimes it's pretty easy to tell when Amy has left for the day and I take over twitter RE https://t.co/NocaYQT0BI
JOURNALISTS GOT TO TOUCH THE PUPPIES AND I STILL HAVEN'T MET THE PUPPIES AND WHY AM I EVEN IN THIS JOB *pouts*
OTTER PICTURES AS PART OF MY DAY JOB HURRAH https://t.co/rlR5Vnnm46
TIL people are really invested in whether or not you get cake. (WE GET CAKE!!!) https://t.co/8MApVnhtGf
@mattlane @WgtnCC this is bloody excellent news! Also HA, that Tom Loosemore talk got me back into public service too!
Hi hello, do y'all use twitter analytics? Have you noticed massive discrepancies in them sometimes? Do you have solutions? Thank you
I learn a LOT in this job https://t.co/FarJQW5Ms6
Finally got to meet our puppies!!! https://t.co/VHAn4rhiey
Today I learned there are OTTERS involved in some of my work https://t.co/KpGXSTf3Or
If six more people could like the MPI Facebook page before my performance review next week, that would be awesome... https://t.co/R1ZMQNB2WH
Want to be my boss? (will you give me candy?) https://t.co/qUjrOAJkbH
Hi hi, wanna work near me? Are you a web content expert? https://t.co/9Bkqqn99N3
Good to finally be able to use my skills now https://t.co/T5z71zJJji
@JoannaTMcLeod and I should tag in @TasmanVet on this...
Worried that with all the amazing work @amysok is doing at Fieldays, my weekly joke will be missed, so here it is https://t.co/q0NgDI7Tb1
I think our tweeter in the field at #fieldays2016 is having a little too much fun (puppies! free ice cream!) https://t.co/Ftwhprq69r
@amysok you'd better watch out or I'll tweet a-llaming puns using those alpaca pics you took
Bloody @amysok is at @FieldaysNZ in the mud but SHE IS TOUCHING THE #detectordogs and THIS ISN'T FAIR I quit
Once this page reaches 10,000 likes, @PhillSherring might finally let me meet a detector dog, so you know what to do https://t.co/jPbONhbx0y
Great article on Curious Minds in the Herald today https://t.co/tHHQZY7yh4
A thing that's never not fun but also kinda sad is setting up lists of words for Facebook pages to automatically block.
Today I learned you can bring emu & kangaroo jerky into the country but not crocodile. Well there goes that business idea then.
@VicMetcalf_NZ and now I get to tweet using the poo emoji for work :)
Real proud to have played a role in kicking this off, so many amazing women profiled https://t.co/s73qe5aw9i
You're right, David, it's definitely girls hating on girls that is the problem in the tech industry https://t.co/iZZLavgwPx
Any day I get to use the poo emoji for work is a good day https://t.co/7UtSCfzVZc
So our office in Whangarei has a FISH COUCH and I am so happy about this. Fiz is listening to the sea https://t.co/7VkGZFZ99k
My coworker needs to rehome this low allergenic LaPerm cat Keven. Anyone need a new friend for your lap? https://t.co/0tmSTokAfL
@Annabel_HM (though I'm running THIS tweetdeck in Firefox and work one in Chrome, so I can't emoji in this unless I paste from emojipedia)
@Styla73 in tweetdeck if you "pop out" your tweet, there should be four buttons, one with a smiley https://t.co/VbSumWumEv
@Annabel_HM We use Tweetdeck regular version but with the Chrome plugin so we can use emoji 👍 We have other monitoring tools though
Awww one of our retired #detectordogs has become a truffle dog! What a life https://t.co/FnNWJcZSc3
I hope all of my sci comm friends have seen the latest John Oliver https://t.co/6WXbjaPSAZ @kimi_collins @DrSMMorgan
@amysok @SteveShep22 alas, they were not to be mine. I had a cup of tea instead. Hope they were glorious though!
Today I'm learning about tying up the anus & not puncturing the gut. Essential public servant info (when doing food safety for hunters)
@amysok @Kaibosh_NZ so much my pleasure
A million years ago (ok maybe 6) I gave Tea Pea social media advice when they were just starting. Now look at them! https://t.co/1KrviDWQe7
"The 19 to 25 ventral scutes (modified scales) form a hard, bony median ridge between the pelvic fins and anus" = content I'm editing today
I bloody love having access to a stock photos account when making presentations https://t.co/qt5XBGhWFm
@jenflitter all good, thanks for providing good teachable moments :)
@jenflitter thanks very much! I do SM at @mpi_nz and am giving the rest of comms team a 102 tomorrow but I think I have enough for now :)
@aschiff @AklCouncil yup sad about the tree but very useful for presentation on govt use of Twitter :)

@sarabeee @IanTLS reaffirming why government agencies do twitter and how to get even better at it
@sarabeee @IanTLS I have nothing so far, I have spent my time choosing a really great picture of an animal using a computer
Alright, working on my Twitter 102: Twitter in Government presentation. Hit me with examples of great govt twitterings please
